001package apprepo;
002
003import static org.junit.Assert.*;
004
005import java.sql.Connection;
006import java.sql.ResultSet;
007import java.sql.Statement;
008import java.util.ArrayList;
009import java.util.List;
010
011import org.junit.Test;
012
013public class SortServletTest2 {
014
015        @Test
016        public void testSortByAppName() {
017                //fail("Not yet implemented");
018                SortServlet sortServlet = new SortServlet();
019                List<Application> applications = new ArrayList<Application>();
020                Application app1 = new Application();
021                app1.setName("A");
022                applications.add(app1);
023                Application app2 = new Application();
024                app2.setName("B");
025                applications.add(app2);
026                printAppList(applications);
027                sortServlet.sortByAppName(applications);
028                printAppList(applications);
029                assertTrue(applications.get(0).getName().equals("A"));
030                assertTrue(applications.get(1).getName().equals("B"));
031        }
032        
033        public void printAppList(List<Application> appList) {
034                
035                for (Application app:appList){
036                        System.out.print(app.getName()+ " ");
037                }
038                System.out.println();
039        }
040
041        
042}
